content.content: COHP is quiet different from many other mods, so it's better to takes a few minutes to understand the game's rule. Here is a few tips you need to know before you start a game.

This mod only works on Specially Made maps whose names start with [Official] or 【官方】, which are included in the mod package. Using the original maps will not make you experience the mod’s full content and gameplay. Please select them from the in-game 'Custom Maps' option. You can also download more maps from our Discord server.
What's History Mode? / Why there is only Allies or Axis faction available?

By default, the game mode is historical Allies vs. Axis: odd-numbered teams are Allied, even-numbered teams are Axis. If you select the 'Free Adversarial Mode' in the 'Advanced' setup > 'Game Options' > 'Starting Units', the faction restrictions are lifted.
